title: Futbol Americas: USMNT's pre-World Cup roster announced
description:
On Wednesday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar react to the 2022 Campeones Cup between NYCFC and Atlas. Where does the MLS vs Liga MX rivalry stand after New York's victory? Then the guys discuss Gregg Berhalter's 26-man roster for the final pre-World Cup matches. Who was left out? Next, we analyze new Chelsea owner Todd Boehly's proposal of incorporating a Premier League All-Star Game. Should he get lost?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
